oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Ralph Majors and his combo at the Bugs Due Drop Inn
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: African Americans--Performances & portrayals;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: One color window card (red on white) announcing Ralph Majors and his combo with the Bugs at the Due Drop Inn on July 11. Poster features a metal photoplate of Ralph Majors.
